title: Sacrifice the Minions not working?
body: I missed out on the doomed minion icon last year because I played the minion game on the NA website instead of the OCE one so I was stoked when I found out they were reintroducing the game this year. However it's not working for me? Like I'll click the little button but nothing happens. Sorry if this is a dumb post but I am absolutely desperate for that icon (PS I've tried the game on my chromebook and desktop, doesn't work on either of them) am I just making a stupid mistake

replies.body:
As per the event page: 
> Sacrifice minions to the dark yordle by November 4, 2016 at 17:59 AEDT and earn the Doomed Minion Icon. Please allow up to two weeks after this date for the Doomed Minion Icon to appear in your account.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016/sacrifice-minions

Unfortunately, the event is not returning and the icon is no longer obtainable. Sorry!
